Text: Mastery is the fifth book by the American author Robert Greene.

Text: Mastery (book): The book examines the lives of great historical figures—such as Charles Darwin, Mozart, and Henry Ford—and contemporary leaders—such as Paul Graham and Freddie Roach—and distills the traits and universal ingredients that made them masters.
